H0.text: what is the minimum wage in france per hour. 10.50

H2.text: what is the minimum wage in france per hour. 9.20

A4.text: In July 2006, the minimum wage in France was set at €8.27 per hour.

A5.text: In July 2008 it was set at €8.71 per hour.

A6.text: As of 1 January 2022, the minimum wage is €10.50.

A7.text: The minimum wage was increased to 9.15 in 2016.
